name: gl-react-starter
description: Starter for scaffolding a new CSR-only React web app
author: GDP Labs

devDependenciesComments.html-webpack-plugin: Generate HTML for us, completed with link to our bundles src
devDependenciesComments.webpack: To build (bundle) our code. Similar to gradle, ant, and maven.
devDependenciesComments.webpack-cli: To run `webpack` command, we need a CLI and this webpack-cli is the obvious choice.
devDependenciesComments.webpack-dev-server: To auto reload our web app whenever there's code changes. Also supports Hot Module Replacement (HMR) if enabled.
